sector.assets_realestate: Fixed Assets & Real Estate Management Solutions

e_invoice.title: E-Invoice Integration
e_invoice.desc: Manage your invoices end-to-end electronically with SAP, increasing your processing speed and cash flow. You can manage incoming and outgoing invoices from a single cockpit and track approval/rejection processes.

e_ledger.title: E-Ledger Integration
e_ledger.desc: Digitize your general and subsidiary ledgers. Create your ledgers by providing a date range via SAP, preview with 'Test Mode', and simplify your audit processes.

e_archive.title: E-Archive Invoice Portal
e_archive.desc: Store all your invoices securely. You can view invoices before sending, add manual notes, manage tax exemption/withholding codes, and perform bulk sending.

e_waybill.title: E-Waybill and Mobile Signature
e_waybill.desc: Manage your shipments electronically. List incoming and outgoing waybills, download them in PDF/XML formats, and speed up your goods receipt processes.

e_reconciliation.title: E-Reconciliation
e_reconciliation.desc: Digitize your BA/BS and current account balance reconciliations. Send automatic reconciliation emails to your customers and vendors, collect responses online, and report within SAP.

e_accounting.title: E-Accounting
e_accounting.desc: This covers the processes of creating and storing your accounting vouchers and legal processes digitally, in full compliance with TRA standards.

e_producer.title: E-Producer Receipt
e_producer.desc: Create your producer receipts electronically, digitize your processes with farmers and producers, and prevent paper waste.

e_guarantee.title: E-Guarantee Letter
e_guarantee.desc: A solution that enables the electronic receipt and issuance of guarantee letters and provides real-time tracking of processes through bank integration.

eho.title: Electronic Account Statement (EAS)
eho.desc: Monitor all your bank account activities from a single screen. Automatically transfer MT940 format statements from banks to the SAP system for accounting.

payment_process.title: Payment Process Management
payment_process.desc: Manage your supplier payments, import transfers, and personnel payments with automatic instructions via SAP. Enhance security with approval mechanisms.

cash_flow.title: Cash Flow Processes
cash_flow.desc: Report your future cash inflows and outflows in real-time. Strengthen your financial decisions by viewing bank balances, pending payments, and collections in a single report.

dbs.title: Direct Debiting System (DDS)
dbs.desc: Secure your collections from your dealer network. Control dealer limits and accelerate your cash flow with automatic collection instructions.

virtual_pos.title: Virtual POS Integration
virtual_pos.desc: Integrate your credit card collections with SAP. Create automatic accounting entries for virtual POS transactions and track bank commissions.

check_promissory.title: Check / Promissory Note Processes
check_promissory.desc: Track your checks/notes in portfolio, in collection, and in collateral. Manage your risk with due date reminders and status updates.

electronic_bulk_payment.title: Electronic Bulk Payment
electronic_bulk_payment.desc: Prepare your multiple payment instructions in accordance with bank formats in a single go and transmit them to the bank.

online_dbs.title: Online DDS Solution
online_dbs.desc: Manage your DDS processes in real-time and online, fully integrated with banks.

inflation_accounting.title: Inflation Accounting Package
inflation_accounting.desc: Manage the impact of inflation on financial statements. Perform automatic revaluation with correction coefficients compliant with VUK and IFRS standards.

auto_clearing.title: Automatic Clearing Program
auto_clearing.desc: Automatically match and clear open items with rules based on balance, reference number, or amount. Supports FIFO logic or balance zeroing methods.

exchange_rate_diff.title: Exchange Rate Difference Invoice Processes
exchange_rate_diff.desc: Automatically calculate exchange rate differences in your current accounts. Create automatic exchange rate difference invoices or accounting vouchers for the resulting differences, with a simulation option.

gib_compliance.title: TRA Compliance Updates
gib_compliance.desc: 100% compliant, up-to-date SAP solutions for the regulatory changes of the Turkish Revenue Administration (VAT rates, withholding codes, etc.).

ifrs.title: IFRS & IFRS 16
ifrs.desc: Reporting sets compliant with International Financial Reporting Standards. Especially for the correct accounting of leasing transactions under IFRS 16.

cost_accounting.title: Cost Accounting
cost_accounting.desc: Analyze your production and service costs in detail by product, order, or cost center. Generate your profitability reports with real data.

travel_mgmt.title: Travel Management
travel_mgmt.desc: Manage personnel travel expenses, per diem calculations, and approval processes through the system.

asset_processes.title: Fixed Asset Processes
asset_processes.desc: Manage the entire lifecycle of fixed assets from acquisition, capitalization, depreciation calculation, to scrapping, all through SAP.

counting.title: Fixed Asset Counting and Assignment
counting.desc: Perform your fixed asset counts with barcode or RFID, and track assignments through the system to reduce the risk of loss/theft.

real_estate.title: Real Estate Management (RE)
real_estate.desc: Manage your company's real estate portfolio, lease agreements, maintenance expenses, and revenues from a single platform.

budget_mgmt.title: Budget Management
budget_mgmt.desc: Plan department-based budgets, compare them with actuals, and have the system provide automatic warnings for budget overruns.

closing_ops.title: Closing Operations
closing_ops.desc: Accelerate month-end and year-end closing processes. Perform automatic allocations, valuations, and carry-forward transactions without errors.

deferred_tax.title: Deferred Tax Calculation
deferred_tax.desc: Automatically calculate and post deferred tax assets and liabilities arising from valuation differences between VUK and IFRS.

transfer_ops.title: 280-180 Transfer Operations
transfer_ops.desc: Ensure that expenses for future months/years are automatically transferred and expensed in the relevant period in accordance with the matching principle.

tms_rediscount.title: TMS Rediscount Calculation
tms_rediscount.desc: Perform rediscount calculations automatically according to TMS standards and manage interest rates for receivables and payables.

risk_mgmt.title: Treasury and Risk Management (TRM)
risk_mgmt.desc: Identify and monitor your financial risks (Currency, Interest Rate, Liquidity). Track derivative instruments and hedging transactions within the system.

credit_limit.title: Credit Limit Report and Risk Management
credit_limit.desc: Analyze your customers' credit limits, DDS limits, open account risks, and collateral status in a single report. Control limit breaches.

collateral.title: Collateral Processes
collateral.desc: Track received and issued letters of guarantee, mortgages, and checks with their due dates. Post automatic entries to special G/L accounts. Send due date reminder emails.

leasing.title: Leasing Processes
leasing.desc: Manage your financial lease agreements, payment plans, and interest segregation. Complete the process with fixed asset integration.

insura.title: Insurance Module (INSURA)
insura.desc: Manage your company's asset insurance policies, endorsements, premium payments, and claims processes with our SAP S/4HANA compliant product.

smart_invoice.title: AI-Powered Smart Invoice
smart_invoice.desc: Scan incoming paper/PDF invoices with OCR and AI. Automatically read amount, date, TIN information to create a preliminary entry in SAP and eliminate manual entry.

mobile_docs.title: Mobile Document Management
mobile_docs.desc: Upload expense receipts and documents by taking a photo via the mobile app and manage approval processes on the go.

auto_matching.title: Automatic Matching and Reminders
auto_matching.desc: Automatically match payments and invoices, and set up automatic reminder emails for overdue payments.

career.title: Career Opportunities
career.text: Are you a talented SAP consultant or developer? Send us your CV!

about.title: About
about.tagline: Short intro about Parla Information Technologies and our value proposition.

section1.title: Who We Are
section1.p: Parla Information Technologies is a team of experienced professionals delivering SAP-based solutions. We adopt sustainable and scalable approaches while digitizing our clients' processes.

section2.title: What We Do
section2.p: We analyze your business processes and design end-to-end solutions using appropriate SAP modules and integrations. We provide migration, license management and post-go-live support services.

section3.title: Our Values
section3.p: Customer-centricity, quality and transparent communication are our core values. We aim to build long-term partnerships in every project.
section3.note: You can include client references or short case studies here if you like.

intro.title: Join Our Team
intro.p1: At Parla Information Technologies, we believe in being part of a team that constantly learns, develops, and shapes technology. While creating value for our clients, we also provide a supportive and dynamic environment for our employees to achieve their career goals.
intro.p2: If you want to make a difference in the SAP world, take part in innovative projects, and grow with a passionate team, you are in the right place.
list: Chance to work on innovative and global projects

install.title: SAP Implementation & Migration
install.intro: We provide end-to-end consultancy from the initial transition to SAP to migrating your existing system to S/4HANA, covering license selection, technical setup, and go-live.

features.title: SAP R/3 License
features.desc: Determining the appropriate SAP R/3 license structure for your current needs and managing the licensing process.

features.title: S/4HANA License
features.desc: Selecting license types suitable for the S/4HANA transition roadmap and preparing for the conversion process.

features.title: Requirement & User Type Analysis
features.desc: Identifying the most suitable licenses, modules, and user types based on your company structure, user count, and processes.

features.title: Cloud ERP Subscription
features.desc: Consultancy on subscription models, cost structures, and transition scenarios for cloud-based SAP ERP solutions.

features.title: BTP Service Packages
features.desc: Designing custom service packages on SAP BTP for your integration, custom development, and reporting needs.

features.title: Maintenance & Renewal Management
features.desc: Systematically tracking and managing license maintenance agreements, renewal dates, and version upgrades.

consulting.title: SAP Consulting and Support
consulting.intro: We offer consultancy services that analyze your existing SAP system, improve your processes, add new functionalities, and provide continuous support for your daily operations.

features.title: Custom Development Services
features.desc: We tailor your SAP processes to your needs by developing custom reports, screens, integrations, and automations for your company.

features.title: SAP Support Services
features.desc: We provide end-to-end support and guidance for errors, performance issues, and user requests you encounter in the live system.

features.title: Custom SAP Solution Implementation (FI/CO/TRM etc.)
features.desc: We provide end-to-end implementation, customization, testing, and go-live consultancy for Finance (FI/CO), Treasury and Risk Management (TRM), and other modules.

workshops.title: Custom SAP Workshops for Your Company
workshops.tagline: Interactive training enriched with your company's data, turning theory into practice.

section1.title: Why a Corporate Workshop?
section1.p: Unlike standard training, our workshops focus directly on your business processes and SAP system. Your team learns using the data and scenarios from their daily operations, which maximizes training efficiency and knowledge retention.

section2.title: Our Workshop Process
section2.p: Before the training, we meet with you to analyze your needs and set goals. We then prepare a custom curriculum and practical scenarios for your company. The training is conducted in an interactive environment led by our expert consultants.

section3.title: What Topics?
section3.p: We can organize workshops on a wide range of topics, from standard modules like FI, CO, TRM, MM, SD to ABAP development or the use of your custom Z-reports. Whatever your need, we can create a custom program for you.
section3.note: Participants are provided with a special certificate and training materials at the end of the workshop.

workshops.image1_alt: A team working in a training environment
workshops.image2_alt: An SAP consultant giving a presentation

online.pageTitle: Online & Classroom SAP Training - Parla Academy
online.title: Structured SAP Training Programs
online.tagline: Module-based training designed to advance your career or enhance your team's competencies.

section1.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
section1.p: Parla Academy provides you with in-depth knowledge of SAP's basic and advanced modules. We offer a roadmap from scratch to expertise in FI (Financial Accounting), CO (Controlling), MM (Materials Management), PP (Production Planning), and ABAP programming.

section2.title: Flexible Training Models
section2.p: Whether you join from anywhere in the world with live online classes or attend in-person training in our fully equipped classrooms, we've designed our programs to meet the needs of working professionals and participants from different geographies.

section3.title: Expert Instructor Staff
section3.p: Our training is delivered by expert SAP consultants with many years of project experience. Our instructors share not only theoretical knowledge but also their field experience with you.
section3.note: A certificate of participation is awarded at the end of all our training programs.

online.image1_alt: A person attending an online SAP training

one_on_one.title: Personalized SAP User Training
one_on_one.tagline: A personal training program designed to help you use SAP more efficiently and accurately in your daily work.

section1.title: End-User Focused Approach
section1.p: Our one-on-one training focuses directly on the end-user's job description and area of responsibility. Instead of complex menus and confusing screens, we provide practical information that enables the user to do their job quickly and correctly.

section2.title: Safe and Practical Learning
section2.p: We eliminate the fear of making mistakes in the live system. Our training is conducted on test systems with realistic scenarios. Users increase their confidence in the system by practicing extensively under the supervision of a consultant.
list: Safe practice in a test environment

section3.title: Who Is It For?
section3.p: This is an ideal solution for new employees, staff moving to a different department, or anyone experiencing difficulties with their current SAP usage. The training progresses flexibly according to the individual's pace and level of understanding.
section3.note: The duration and content of the training can be fully customized to the user's needs.

one_on_one.image1_alt: A user working one-on-one with a consultant
one_on_one.image2_alt: A person looking at an SAP screen at a computer

consulting.title: Technical Training for Future Consultants
consulting.tagline: In-depth technical and process knowledge for key users and consultant candidates.

section1.title: In-depth Module Knowledge
section1.p: This program goes beyond standard user training to teach the configuration (customizing) and technical infrastructure of SAP modules (FI, CO, TRM, etc.). Participants understand not only 'how' the system works, but also 'why' it works that way.

section2.title: Project Methodology and Consulting Skills
section2.p: A good consultant not only has technical knowledge but also masters project management and communication skills. Our training covers project steps such as analysis, design, testing, and go-live, as well as client management principles.

section3.title: Who Is It For?
section3.p: This training is designed for professionals who are key users in their companies, wish to pursue a career as an SAP consultant, or aim to deepen their existing consulting knowledge.
section3.note: At the end of the training, a case study is conducted where participants apply what they have learned on a project scenario.

consulting.image1_alt: A meeting room where a group of people are discussing a project
consulting.image2_alt: A consultant explaining an SAP system diagram
